desc: A small craft brewery located in the Junction neighbourhood in Toronto, crafting bold flavourful beers with dishes to match. Now with two locations, join us at Eataly Toronto in the Birroteca by Indie or at the Junction Brewpub. Offering free beer delivery within Toronto as well as shipping rates for across Ontario.

layout.text: We make it easy! Beer to your door ordered from the comfort and safety of your own home!
